location_description: Construction site with scaffolding and active work areas

hazards.description: A red bag is placed unsecured on a horizontal scaffolding beam directly above the worker, posing a significant risk of falling and striking personnel below.
recommended_actions: Immediately remove the unsecured item from the overhead structure.
Implement a strict policy for securing all tools and materials when working at height.
Conduct a toolbox talk on dropped object prevention.
Ensure proper barricading or exclusion zones are established below overhead work areas.

hazards.description: The worker's head is covered by a hood, obscuring whether a hard hat is being worn. In a construction environment with overhead structures and ongoing work, a hard hat is typically mandatory to protect against head injuries.
recommended_actions: Verify if the worker is wearing a hard hat underneath the hood. If not, instruct the worker to wear one immediately.
Reinforce site-specific PPE requirements for all personnel.
Ensure all workers are trained on the importance and correct use of PPE.
